item.title: Daniel Day-Lewis Says He Should Have Kept His “Mouth Shut” About Acting Retirement
item.description: Day-Lewis is about to star in the movie ‘Anemone,’ which will be his first acting job since he announced his retirement in 2017.

item.title: 2025 NY Film Festival Reveals Currents Lineup
item.description: The international showcase representing 28 countries will have the U.S. premiere of Ben Rivers’ ‘Mare’s Nest’ as its centerpiece film and includes Radu Jude’s ‘Dracula.’

item.title: 2025 NY Film Festival Reveals Currents Lineup
item.description: The international showcase representing 28 countries will have the U.S. premiere of Ben Rivers’ ‘Mare’s Nest’ as its centerpiece film and includes Radu Jude’s ‘Dracula.’

item.title: NY Film Festival Sets ‘After the Hunt’ as Opening Night Movie
item.description: The Luca Guadagnino-directed title from Amazon MGM Studios stars Julia Roberts, Ayo Edebiri and Andrew Garfield and will receive its North American premiere at the Manhattan event.

item.title: NY Film Festival Sets ‘After the Hunt’ as Opening Night Movie
item.description: The Luca Guadagnino-directed title from Amazon MGM Studios stars Julia Roberts, Ayo Edebiri and Andrew Garfield and will receive its North American premiere at the Manhattan event.
